attributes.action: National Insurance Contributions, why not do you have to keep paying after 65
attributes.background: I have just reached the age of 65 and after being told my NI Contribution stops at 65 I have now been told it is Nov 19, as my state pension age has had 6 months added.  I will have paid 50 years contributions yet you only need 33 years to qualify!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254202
